params.name: data

params.name: data.tag_template
params.description: Required. The template to update. The "name" field must be set.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: The field mask specifies the parts of the template to overwrite. Allowed fields: * display_name If absent or empty, all of the allowed fields above will be updated.
